name: Desktop Crewmate
description:
Have you ever felt alone in space? Well look no further. Adopt your very own crewmate companion that we've carefully rescued wandering around in space.

This crewmate companion will follow you around and see you do your tasks. Take care of each other or kill them off. 

Feedback is welcome :) Would love to hear your experience with your crewmate and suggestions for activities you'd like to do and see.

For more information follow me @itsDaumPark.

Note: I am not affiliated with InnerSlothDev or Among Us. This is a fan-game and all assets were re-created.
